data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Their ____ is ____ played ____ a ____ at ____. Even so, they are still touring and can still deliver an entertaining performance that caters to their fans.
data.partBlankContent: The 90s band Right Said Fred was formed by two brothers in Britain in 1989. While th___ most fam___ single i_ unquestionably si___, i_ also gai___ them worl_____ acclaim. Their mu___ is of___ played a_ a jo__ at par____. Even so, they are still touring and can still deliver an entertaining performance that caters to their fans.
data.answer: 90年代的Right Said Fred乐队由两兄弟于1989年在英国组建。虽然他们最著名的单曲毫无疑问是愚蠢的，但它也为他们赢得了世界范围内的赞誉。他们的音乐在聚会上经常被当作笑话播放。即使如此，他们仍然在巡演，仍然可以提供一个娱乐的表演，迎合他们的粉丝。
